name: Sunflower
description: A tall annual plant with bright, sun-like blooms that follow the movement of the sun.

name: Petunia
description: A vibrant annual plant with colorful, trumpet-shaped blooms ideal for borders and hanging baskets.
shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Zinnia
description: A fast-growing flower with bright, daisy-like blooms that attract butterflies.

careGuide.Light: Full sun exposure for maximum blooms.
careGuide.Water: Water deeply once or twice a week.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Daffodil
description: A cheerful spring flower with bright yellow petals and a trumpet-like center.

careGuide.Water: Water during growth; reduce after flowering.

shippingDetails: Ships within 2–4 business days. 14-day return policy if damaged on arrival.

name: Geranium
description: A hardy plant with rounded leaves and clusters of colorful blooms.

careGuide.Water: Moderate watering; let soil dry between.
